In Arts and Sciences, there are several committees that oversee

curriculum in the different schools, including the Columbia College/

School of General Studies Committee on Instruction (COI) and the

Graduate School of Arts and Sciences Executive Committee (GSAS EC).

The Educational Policy and Planning Committee (EPPC) is supposed

to coordinate curricular decison-making across the schools.

EPPC

Arts & Sciences

The proposed changes would more greatly centralize decision-making

in one Committee on Instruction, which would take over the work of

the CC/GS COI and the GSAS EC, and abolish the EPPC.
